steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"91flb","text":"Examine the average diameter of filter opening by referring to the catalog of the sheet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2rfn","text":"Measure the inner diameter (cm) of the cut side of (b) and calculate the cross-sectional area (inner diameter x inner diameter x 3.14) (Cross-sectional area of test sheet). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb123","text":" Cut a 2 cm area from the opening of the tip of the P200 pipette with scissors (c). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"700v1","text":"Cut a 3 cm area from the opening of the other P200 pipette tip with scissors (d).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fsr25","text":"Connect (b) Connect (c) and (d) (yellow arrow). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c6p6c","text":"Cover (b) with the test sheet (3cm×3cm) on the red line. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7b3eu","text":"Fix the sheet by fitting (a) (blue arrow).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4c61e","text":"Cut the sheet that protrudes from (a). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
